item.title: ‘My brother found God in recovery’: How do you save for retirement when ‘God will provide’ is your core value?
item.description: “Are there CFPs who are more aligned with a pragmatic, yet Christian, approach?”

item.title: ‘They knocked her down and started biting’: My mother, 84, was viciously attacked by her neighbor’s two dogs. Do we sue?
item.description: “The police, ambulance and animal control were all called immediately. The dogs were removed and put down.”

item.title: ‘Everyone was grieving’: Did my wife’s brothers swindle her out of her inheritance? There’s a condo and $550K at stake.
item.description: “When my wife’s mom passed away, the eldest brother took on the role as executor.”

item.title: Two of Wall Street’s last holdouts finally concede the Fed will cut next month
item.description: Two of the last few remaining Wall Street holdouts on the Fed easing next month have finally conceded defeat and now expect the central bank to reduce...
